website_summaries.verdict: With all the required installation materials included, Frost King is truly the whole package.
pros: The cable is sturdy and holds up well in harsh conditions and low temperatures
Electrical tape required for installation is included
Thermostat will automatically turn on and off according to surrounding temperature
LED on and off indicator is easy to see on 3-prong plug
cons: Has a heavy impact on hydro usage

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for wife. Much cheaper than electric blanket she was nagging me about.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Gibson

customer_reviews.title: No complaints for RV use!
customer_reviews.text: I used it for my RV over the winter. Way cheaper than heated hoses! I paralleled it on the water hose, taped every foot and covered with pool noodles and never had an issue when everyone else was frozen up! Worth every penny and easy to work with, good visual glow and temperature sensor did well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2 months in and it stopped working
customer_reviews.text: It did great while it lasted. Then we had a freeze and -nada-. Wasn't even warm. Completely dead and I can't figure out why. It hasn't been moved, tampered with, chewed on or anything. Fortunately I bought pipe insulation also so the pipes didn't freeze. It's too late for a refund, we may need to talk to Amazon about this '30 day return' policy. Sometimes it's just not long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Kena Lea

customer_reviews.title: No main water line chances of freezing to my house
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 heat tapes had both installed in the ground to protect my water line incoming from the city, never had a frozen line worried about it freezing. When returning from trips the main water line to house water would run out fast and slow, than after a while run right again, felt very close to having been frozen. Installed heat tapes in one inch plastic pipes - put 2 bags of peat moss over plastic pipe to hold heat and cold apart, will sleep better now. The plastic pipe is to protect the heat tape
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy & Highly Recommend!! A+
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this heat cable. Secured it to my RV hose with electrical tape, wrapped foil around it, put the gray foam pipe insulation over that, then wrapped the entire hose with outdoor duct tape. The weather gets VERY cold in Central Oregon. Keeps my water flowing as if it was 80° out. I’ve used Frost King products for eight years and will continue to use and recommend them. A+
customer_reviews.author: Crash Clark

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the hose line coming into our trailer from freezing.
customer_reviews.text: We had our hose freeze before we got this item. A frozen water line created a lot of problems in the morning when we had no water. My husband ran to the nearest store for water just so we could get ready for work and have our morning coffee at the very least. Since installing the heater cord, with pipe foam tubes installed over the hose and cord, we have had no freezing water line--not even a need to leave the water dripping at night in freezing temperatures. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah J Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last through half of a winter
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working after 2 months. Had to spend $50 to repair the frozen pipe. Go another route.
customer_reviews.author: Shanda

customer_reviews.title: Does like it should
customer_reviews.text: Installed this last year then covered the pipes with foam I live in a mobile home in Michigan and have a lot of issues with freezing didn't have a single one throughout the winter and I do not expect any this winter
customer_reviews.author: Richard s cross

customer_reviews.title: Great product! No issues since installing.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product!! I've used others in the past and ended up replacing every other year. This is still working great! I followed the installation instructions and have not had any issues. Very happy with my purchase. Definitely recommend if you've had issues with other products.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Peterson

customer_reviews.title: No Frozen Water For Full-Time RVers
customer_reviews.text: The heat cable worked out awesome. This is the first year we had to use it as we are still relatively new to this new full-time RV living. We had no problem with freezing water and had water all winter long.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Mehalic

customer_reviews.title: Nursery
customer_reviews.text: Worked great i used it for a dog nursery. Install it under a sheet of plywood to keep puppies warm and off the hard cold ground. Wood stayed warm. Not hot at all just so nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Seems nice to not have to leave the water running or thaw frozen pipes any more. Installed quickly and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Troy E.

customer_reviews.title: Budget heated hose
customer_reviews.text: I made a heated hose by putting this tape against the hose; then wrapped that in aluminum foil and wrapped that in Pipe foam. I covered that in a tight, waterproof layer of duct tape which made a great layer of heated hose, totally waterproof. Cost effective way to achieve your goal.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy Bamford

customer_reviews.title: Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Easy way to prevent water line to an RV from freezing
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Hot mama
customer_reviews.text: Used to keep a water line from freezing. It's worked great for 2 years now and counting.
customer_reviews.author: Gummy Bear

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my rv fresh water hose and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Fuss

customer_reviews.title: I’ll buy more if needed
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and install. Can’t talk about longevity because I’ve just installed them.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Nice heating wire
customer_reviews.text: Great heating wiring! I used on my Motorhome water hose and it worked fine
customer_reviews.author: Ronnieanddebland

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt heat up
customer_reviews.text: Installed this and it doesnt work at all. Poor product that seems to have this problem for a lot people. Save you money and dont buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Smoking in CO

customer_reviews.title: Kept water flowing.
customer_reviews.text: easy installation, keep water flowing even in neg 40 degrees in my modular.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and keep the pipe/hose from frozen!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and install and keep the pipe/hose from frozen! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth buying to save my pipes from freezing haven't had a problem yet!
customer_reviews.author: Evie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used on pipes that had freezing issues, does the trick
customer_reviews.author: J.S.R.

customer_reviews.title: Works down to zero degrees with no issues.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install...We had temps below zero , and no issues...Yes , will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Use this for my rv’s Water hoes in 20 degrees weather and did it’s job had no problem
customer_reviews.author: Isaac G

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Product was advertised and expected. I have since purchased 3 more.
customer_reviews.author: patrick hennemuth

customer_reviews.title: Need one? Get one!
customer_reviews.text: I've yet to purchase one of these that has a problem. They all seem to work well, do their job quietly and unassumingly.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A. Dietrich

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: It was a very good price. Very easy to install by myself and, It Works!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... last winter my pipes didn't freeze one time very happy with
customer_reviews.text: I put it on last winter my pipes didn't freeze one time very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: Water line heat tape
customer_reviews.text: Hard to rate except we haven't had severely cold temperatures this winter yet. But so far no frozen pipes!
customer_reviews.author: J. Ott

customer_reviews.title: This is something I would like to see them change eventually as you're never quite ...
customer_reviews.text: This heat tape has a LED indicator which shows when there is power applied to the heat tape instead of when the heat tape is active. This is something I would like to see them change eventually as you're never quite sure when the heat tape is on or off. However it does a superior job one applied properly to both metal and see PVC pipe.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work - Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: Read the directions, plugged it in, this one never worked, they must not have tested it at the factory.
customer_reviews.author: Seth DC

customer_reviews.title: Does not work on PEX or other plastic pipes - even though it says it does in the description
customer_reviews.text: Does not work on PEX or other plastic pipes!! It will melt these.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: No very realiable - which is essential.
customer_reviews.text: Only slightly warm and no way they will ever keep pipe from freezing. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: ... an told amazon an they have done nothing not happy about
customer_reviews.text: does not work need to return it an told amazon an they have done nothing not happy about this
customer_reviews.author: Don O.

product_meta.title: Frost King HC30A Heating Cables, 30 Feet, Black
product_meta.description: Frost King automatic heat cables with self regulating thermostat keeps pipes from freezing down to as cold as 38 below zero. Available in lengths from 3' to 30'.
feature_bullets: For metal and plastic residential water pipes
Keeps water flowing down to (-40) degrees F
For use on 2 in. metal and plastic water pipes.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars252 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
